name: WKInterfaceSCNScene
desc: An object that lets you manage SceneKit content for display in your app.

items.name: var antialiasingMode: SCNAntialiasingMode
items.desc: The antialiasing mode used for rendering the scene.

items.name: var preferredFramesPerSecond: Int
items.desc: The animation frame rate that the interface uses to render its scene.

items.name: func snapshot() -> UIImage
items.desc: Renders the scene to a new image object.
